subject: Mathematics - Analysis of PDEs
Mathematics - Logic
creator: de Piro, Tristram
title:
A Simple Proof of the Uniform Convergence of Fourier Series Using
  Nonstandard Analysis
description:
We give a proof of the uniform convergence of Fourier series, using the
methods of nonstandard analysis.
Comment: arXiv admin note: text overlap with arXiv:1311.1682
